Invocation for when it thunder.ARABIC_TEXT: ((سُبْحَانَ الَّذِي يُسَبِّحُ الرَّعْدُ بِحَمْدِهِ وَالْمَلاَئِكةُ مِنْ خِيفَتِهِ)).
Invocation for when it thunder.TRANSLATED_TEXT: (How perfect He is, (The One) Whom the thunder declares His perfection with His praise, as do the angles out of fear of Him.)
